title: Korean Vlogger Harassed in Jodhpur: Man arrested for flashing at Korean vlogger, horrific act caught on camera | Jodhpur News - Times of India
selftext: Came across a news of Korean vlogger where she was exploring Jodhpur and a man flashed his d**k. She rushed to ask for help. That video boiling my blood. Spoiling Image of India again and again. How do I trust sending my mom, my sister, my girlfriend on my own anywhere? Argh.
comments: WTF,That idiot needs to be arrested ASAP.
